ValidationRule.description: User must enter values in the Approved By and Date of Approval fields if the Exception for Credit is granted and the Exception Decision is received
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL( Request_ADJ_Exception_for_Credit__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Await_Credit_Exception_Decision__c,"Received") ), AND(ISBLANK( Date_of_Approval__c) ,ISBLANK( Exception_Approved_by__c )),NULL )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Name of the Approver and the Date
